title: Strengthening Leadership Practice Competencies: Research Ethics in MUITEL Informal Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced scientific expertise at the post-secondary level and basic mobile technology proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify three major ethical dilemmas arising when applying MUITEL in informal learning environments.
Learners can propose at least two learner privacy protection measures when designing mobile technology-based research.
Learners can explain ethical issues at the formal-informal learning boundary in technology-enhanced learning environments through case analysis.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
